attributes.action: Allow golf courses to open during the new lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Allow golf courses to open during the new lockdown.

Each tee time are around 7 minutes with most holes over 300 yards on an 18 hole course.

Only 2 balls as we are allowed to exercise with 1 other person.
attributes.background:
Allow golf courses to open during the new lockdown.

Golf courses are widely open to fresh air and social distance 1 or 2 balls.

Golf is a form of exercise.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
